paragraph: To call or text the contact number for a consultation

detailsData.title: Experienced Attorneys
detailsData.content: Our team has over 40 years of experience in successfully representing clients with catastrophic injuries and wrongful death.

detailsData.title: Results-Driven Approach
detailsData.content: We focus on achieving justice for our injured clients, ensuring they receive the compensation they deserve.

detailsData.title: Client Satisfaction
detailsData.content: Built on referrals and results, our firm has a history of satisfied clients who continue to trust us for legal representation.

detailsData.title: Personalized Attention
detailsData.content: We offer a high level of personal attention to each client, ensuring their best interests are at the center of our practice.

address: 100 Wall Street, 15th Floor, New York, NY 10005-3709
subHeading: New York City Personal Injury Attorneys
valueProp: At Rosenbaum & Rosenbaum, P.C., our NYC personal injury attorneys have successfully represented clients with all types of cases involving catastrophic injuries and wrongful death.
